sql_list.sql_query:
select
	s."CustomerID",    
    s."RevisionNumber",
    s."OrderDate",
    s."DueDate",
    s."ShipDate",
    s."Status",
    s."OnlineOrderFlag",
    s."SalesOrderNumber",
    s."AccountNumber",
    c."FromCurrencyCode", c."ToCurrencyCode",s."SalesOrderID",
    s."TerritoryID", s."ShipToAddressID", s."CurrencyRateID",
    s."SubTotal" as "SubTotal_USD", s."SubTotal"/c."AverageRate" as "SubTotal_GBP",
    s."TaxAmt",
    s."Freight",
    s."TotalDue" as "TotalDue_USD",    
    s."TotalDue"/c."AverageRate" as  "totaldue_gbp"
FROM
    lnd.salesorderheader s
LEFT JOIN
    lnd.currencyrate c ON s."CurrencyRateID" = c."CurrencyRateID"
WHERE
    c."FromCurrencyCode" IS NOT NULL;
sql_list.table_used_desc: query to bring data from landing to stage layer for sales data
